WRITING.TEXT: Would love to say MCW as well. Schrder will benefit when Teague is off the scene in ATL. Hoping my fellow Aussie, Exum returns from his injury better than ever (fingers crossed)
Cheers for this! Made the misses buy it for Valentines Day
Since moving to UK from Australia, I rarely get to watch games now with the putrid time difference. Quite depressing, wake up every morning and have to get on Reddit to see highlights
